divs: sighting details i took these pictures from my balcony, and outside my apartment. i first noticed objects after downloading chemtrail, weather, and sunset pictures. i noticed the first objects in pictures taken june 27, 2007, in the late afternoon. i was excited to see these, and continued to photograph, and have taken pictures of many ufo's of various sizes and shapes almost daily since then. at times there are dozens, maybe more than one hundred in the sky, mid to late afternoon. in many pictures, there are beings of different types, including what appears to be families and pets, as seen through the ufo windows. some of what i have seen is awe inspiring. i have photographed directly under some of these craft. i have felt it to be a friendly presence. the pictures speak volumes. http:\\www.picasaweb.google.com\dsholter
Object Shape: Blimp, Boomerang, Bullet, Missile, Cigar, Cone, Chevron, Circle, Cross, Cylinder, Diamond, Disc, Egg, Fireball, Flash, Oval, Saturn-like, Sphere, Square, Rectagular, Star-like, Teardrop, Triangle, Other, Unknown
Summary: Daily event since June 27, 2007 - groups of UFO's gather about 4pm to after 8pm
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around June 30th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
